summary.para: Called when the thread loses the UI focus.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Called when the thread receives the UI focus.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The ITfThreadFocusSink interface is implemented by an application or TSF text service to receive notifications when the thread receives or loses the UI focus. This advise sink is installed by calling the TSF Manager's with IID_ITfThreadFocusSink.
